item.title: Publications
item.description: A list of publications References Allen, James, Hannah An, Ritwik Bose, Will de Beaumont, and Choh Man Teng. 2020. “A Broad-Coverage Deep Semantic Lexicon for Verbs.” In Proceedings of the 12th Language Resources and Evaluation Conference, 3243–51. Marseille, France: European Language Resources Association. https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/2020.lrec-1.396. Bender, Michael A., Ritwik Bose, Rezaul Chowdhury, and Samuel McCauley. 2012. “The Kissing Problem: How to End a Gathering When Everyone Kisses Everyone Else Goodbye.” In Fun with Algorithms, edited by Evangelos Kranakis, Danny Krizanc, and Flaminia Luccio, 28–39.
